See also: bitte

Danish[edit]

Etymology[edit]

Shortening of Birgitte.

Proper noun[edit]

Bitte

  1. A female given name.

German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

From Old High German beta, bita, from Proto-Germanic *bedō. Cognate with Dutch bede.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • Audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Bitte f (genitive Bitte, plural Bitten)

  1. request

Further reading[edit]

  • Bitte in Duden online

Norwegian[edit]

Etymology[edit]

Shortening of Birgitte.

Proper noun[edit]

Bitte

  1. A female given name.

Swedish[edit]

Etymology[edit]

Shortening of Birgitte.

Proper noun[edit]

Bitte c (genitive Bittes)

  1. A female given name.
